level.heading: Becoming member.
level.text: A person shall become a member:
As provided in the organic rules;
As the result of a merger under subchapter XV of this chapter or a transaction under Chapter 2 of this title; or
With the consent of all the members.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 502 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
